promoText: Launch offer: 15% OFF on all services

surfLessons.text: Surf lessons for all levels, from beginner to advanced

rentalBoards.text: We rent surfboards from longboards to small boards; choose the ideal model for you

film.text: Personalized coaching for your surf progression; we film your sessions and review them together

retreats.text: Live surfing intensely ‚Äî surf camps and immersions with great waves and good food

coursesList.text: Everything we offer at NaBoa Surf Camp is listed below; choose the ideal package for you. If you didn't find what you're looking for, contact us

taibaSection.text: Waves all year round in a peaceful, welcoming setting

testimonies.quote: We came from S√£o Paulo to have this wonderful experience at NaBoa Surf Camp! Instructor Caio led all our lessons (three days straight) with great care and patience which resulted in amazing progress. Highly recommended ‚Äî I plan to come back ‚ú®üôèüçÉ
testimonies.name: Victoria

testimonies.quote: Incredible experience, highly recommended! Kaio is an excellent instructor and made me feel comfortable and confident during my first surf lesson. He has great technique and pedagogy ‚Äî very patient and knowledgeable.
testimonies.name: Carla Tanaka

testimonies.quote: I take surf lessons in Fortaleza and had a private lesson with Caio which was a game changer ‚Äî wonderful experience. He teaches calmly and with a lot of technique; I'm booking more lessons this holiday to keep progressing.
testimonies.name: Sandy

testimonies.quote: Amazing place in Ta√≠ba. Great energy, great people and a very welcoming vibe. Highly recommended!
testimonies.name: Pedro

testimonies.quote: Fantastic reception ‚Äî Kaio is a really nice guy, provided us full support, offers board rentals, knows the spots and the best places for your session! I'll be back many times. P.S. They also do photo and video sessions.
testimonies.name: Edmilson

kiteSection.text: If you already practice kitesurf, come learn to surf with us in Ta√≠ba ‚Äî it fits perfectly into your routine

question1.title: Do I need to know how to surf to take a surf lesson?
question1.answer: No ‚Äî our surf lessons are designed for all levels, from complete beginners to advanced surfers. Our experienced instructors will adapt the lesson to your needs and abilities.

question2.title: Do I need to have my own equipment for lessons?
question2.answer: No ‚Äî we provide all necessary equipment for surf lessons. However, if you have your own board or gear, feel free to bring it.

question3.title: How do I book a lesson or package?
question3.answer: You can book a lesson or package directly with us through WhatsApp or Instagram.

question4.title: Where can I stay during my visit?
question4.answer: We have a partnership with Casa Mar Ta√≠ba (our HQ) and other local options; contact us for recommendations.
